channel.title: Need advice
channel.description:
the bitchy teachers at my school say they are gonna start doing checks on our USB flash disk drives... and if we have any games, music or anything non-school related we get detention and they will delete them... what should i do? make a local copy of my stuff on my hard drive and delete it off my USB Drive? hide the files and hope they wont notice... hmmmm... well i dont know.. someone plz help.
PS. the only stuff on there that isnt school stuff is just a few flash games and movies and some Qbasic stuff.

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Icy_Inferno Icy Inferno
item.description:
@Icy_Inferno wrote:

Use “Hide my crap”. http://www.freewarefiles.com/program_9_223_19246.html.

My friend made it. Christopher Amedor Snyder.

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:9, topic:110612”][quote author=puref0rlyfe link=topic=158064.msg1485647#msg1485647 date=1181825541]
the bitchy teachers at my school say they are gonna start doing checks on our USB flash disk drives… and if we have any games, music or anything non-school related we get detention and they will delete them… what should i do? make a local copy of my stuff on my hard drive and delete it off my USB Drive? hide the files and hope they wont notice… hmmmm… well i dont know… someone plz help.

PS. the only stuff on there that isnt school stuff is just a few flash games and movies and some Qbasic stuff.
[/quote]

Tell them to get fucked, it’s your flash drive, what right do they have to delete anything on it? Of course they can tell you not to use it in their computer, but then you can’t do your work, can you?[/quote]
True.

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice

Tell them to get fucked, it’s your flash drive, what right do they have to delete anything on it? Of course they can tell you not to use it in their computer, but then you can’t do your work, can you?

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @puref0rlyfe puref0rlyfe
item.description:
@puref0rlyfe wrote:

ok i think i will buy a second one, but i just need to find where i can get one for a decent price. thanks for help guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If they check personal flash drives, then simply buy two identical ones.

Have one with your legit work on it, and have them check it. Once that’s done you simply remove the one you showed to the teacher and replace it with the secondary one.

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Just tell your parents the situation in your in. I’m sure $24 for a flash drive is fine. (Well that’s how much they are in this shop here)

Either, or burn your files to a CDR/W so you can delete and add.

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @puref0rlyfe puref0rlyfe
item.description:
@puref0rlyfe wrote:

thats what im thinking of and i might if i can find one at a good price.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2007, 02:11:24 AM[/size][hr]and the ones that they want to check are ours… i mean its bullshit, they want to give us detention for putting stuff on something thats ours… they say just because they told us to buy it(coz it was on the book list) that they can tell us what to do with it and can delete our stuff of it if we do something with it that they dont want us to… i mean, we paid for it(or our parents did) they cant tell us what to do with it…

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Just buy your own flash drive?

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @puref0rlyfe puref0rlyfe
item.description:
@puref0rlyfe wrote:

yer id do that but they havent said when or how often they would do it so i dont know when to copy it back on/off.

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Put the stuff off your flash drive onto your computer, then whack some school stuff onto it… Get it checked… Then put your stuff back on?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2007, 01:56:41 AM[/size][hr]Or, hide it in C:\WINDOWS
And just make a file called…
TempFiles…
Something that sounds important.

Read full topic
